purpose: Foundational type guards, deep-copy utilities, JSON serialization, and dictionary helpers for TypeScript/Deno
keyExports: isString, isNumber, isBoolean, isDate, isArray, isObject, etc. — runtime type guard functions
_ namespace (combiner.ts) — deepCopy with optional string substitution
stripJsonComments — remove comments from JSON before parsing

keyPatterns.name: Type guards
keyPatterns.description: Use isString(val), isNumber(val), isDate(val), etc. instead of typeof or instanceof checks for consistent runtime type safety

keyPatterns.name: Deep copy with substitution
keyPatterns.description: _.deepCopy(obj, { replace: { key: 'value' } }) performs a deep clone and substitutes ${key} placeholders in string values

architecture.flow: types.ts (guards) + combiner.ts (deep copy) + dictutil.ts (dict ops) + strip-comments.ts → mod.ts
architecture.keyDesign: Zero internal @epdoc dependencies; this is the foundational package all others depend on
